Get Ready for the Ultimate VR Sports Experience!
We’re thrilled to announce the release of three brand-new sports in the latest DLC for All In One Sports VR!
This DLC brings a whole new level of excitement to All In One Sports VR.
Whether you crave the intense discipline of combat sports or the adrenaline rush of team-based play, we’ve got you covered!
Each of these new sports will challenge you in unique ways, offering fresh, immersive experiences designed to push your skills and keep the adrenaline pumping.
This isn’t just an update—it’s a major expansion that adds even more excitement and variety to your favorite VR sports game.
1. KungFu
Unleash your inner martial artist!
Engage in intense sparring sessions, using real Kung Fu movements to block, deflect, and counter your opponent's attacks.
Feel the precision and agility required as you train like a true master.
2. Hockey
Challenge yourself to a fast-paced air hockey game.
Use the VR controller to control your paddle with pinpoint accuracy to block, attack, and dominate your opponents.
The winning dash is just one puck away!
3. Soccer
Step into the ultimate VR soccer experience!
Whether you're dribbling past defenders, making that perfect pass, or shooting for goal, this mode brings the thrill of the pitch right to your living room with ultra-realistic physics and immersive gameplay.

1.3.1 Hotfix Update Details
Badminton

Fixed a bug where players could catch the shuttlecock after serving.
Bowling/Archery

Changed the UI text color for better readability.
Boxing

Resolved the lighting issue with the mini-game gloves.
We hope these updates make your gameplay experience smoother and more enjoyable. We always welcome your feedback and appreciate your continuous support and love for our game. We will continue to do our best to provide you with an even better gaming experience.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
The All-In-One Sports VR Team

1.3.0 Version Update!!

Hello, dear players!

We are excited to bring you a brand new update that will make your gaming experience even more diverse and enjoyable. In this update, we have added amazing Cosmetics for the tools and balls you need to play the game!

General Improvements

Matching System Improvements
Reduced Random Matching Wait Time
If the wait time for random matching becomes too long, the system will now automatically match you with an AI opponent. Enjoy faster matchmaking for a seamless gaming experience.

Timeout Loss Penalty
Players will automatically be considered defeated if they exceed the time limit twice during a game. This ensures smooth and fair gameplay.

New Tool Cosmetics
Achieve various milestones in each category and earn new cosmetics! Enjoy a more exciting gameplay experience.
Equip the new Cosmetics and show off your amazing style in the game!

examples:
Table Tennis: Score 100 points with smashes
Boxing: Knock down opponents 100 times
Archery: Win 10 shoot-offs

Spectator Cheering Tools Update
We have added two new cheering tools for spectators: the Lightsaber and Fireworks. Enhance your spectator mode experience by using these diverse cheering tools to show your support and excitement!



Specific Game Updates

Table Tennis
Rally Scoring Rule Change
During a rally, if the opponent hits the ball and it does not hit the table but you return it, the opponent will lose the point.
Serve Spin Adjustment
The spin strength of serves has been reduced by 50%, making serves easier to handle.

Badminton
Serve Rule Adjustment
Previously, you had to hold the shuttlecock before serving, but now you can serve without holding it, allowing for more dynamic play.

Baseball
Changed the pitching mechanics.

Darts
Added a rule where a player loses if they timeout twice in a multiplayer game.

Billiards
Removed the UI that shows ball-related information to make multiplayer games more challenging.
Fixed the issue with the cue ball's hit point location.
Restored the missing trackpad movements.
Added a rule where a player loses if they timeout twice in a multiplayer game.


Boxing
Added a vibration animation when the health bar decreases.
Improved the camera tracking of the health bar for smoother movement.




We strive to provide a more enjoyable and seamless gaming experience by incorporating your feedback. Discover the new features and improvements in this update!

Thank you.

[ Appnori Inc. ]

1.2.0 Version Update!!

Hello, dear players!

We would like to extend our heartfelt thanks to all of you for your continuous love and enjoyment of our game. We've been working hard to incorporate your valuable feedback into this latest update. We've added several new features and made improvements to existing ones. Please see the details below.

Major Updates
1. Spectator Mode Added
You can now watch ongoing multiplayer matches in real-time. Enjoy spectating your friends' or other players' games!

2. RoomList UI Added
You can now view a real-time list of rooms available for multiplayer matchmaking. Find and join the room you want easily.

3. Game History UI Added
A new feature allows you to check your recent game history. Easily review which matches you've played and your performance in them.

4. Multiplayer Matchmaking Server Integration
The server selection UI has been removed and all servers have been integrated. Enjoy faster and more convenient multiplayer matchmaking.



Other Updates
1. Lobby Trophy Functionality Changed
The trophy feature in the lobby has been improved. Check out the new look of your trophies!

2. Random Multiplayer Matchmaking Wait Time Removed
The wait time for random multiplayer matchmaking has been removed, allowing you to start games more quickly.


We always value your feedback and strive to provide a better gaming environment. We hope this update enhances your gaming experience even further. As always, we welcome your opinions and suggestions.

Enjoy your time in the game, and we look forward to seeing you there!

Thank you.

[ Appnori Inc. ]
